Title: The 2010 World Expo in Shanghai China -- "Educational Wall Charts Entering Primary and Secondary Schools across the Country" Theme Activity
Designer: PRC Education Ministry (中华人民共和国教育部)Xinhua tongxun she (新华通讯社)
Notes: The poster, titled "The Charm of the Venue: 'Theme Pavilions, International Organization Pavilions, Enterprise Pavilions'" (场馆魅力之“主题馆，国际组织馆，企业馆”), shows photographs of the Pavilion of Future (城市未来馆), the Pavilion of Footprints (城市足迹馆), pavilions by the State Grid, China Petrol, China aviation companies, electronics, etc.The poster was sponsored by China Eastern (中国东方航空).
Tags: 中国2010年上海世界博览会
